channel.title: The Twins (Neutral Killer)
channel.description:
## **The Twins (Neutral Killer)**
**Passives:**
**Soul bound:** If your twin dies in any way you commit suicide immediately.
**Tricky Twins:** Death immune
**Day abilities:**
**Soul Twins:** Your vote will count twice in this *trial.* (Changed from election) Your twin will be unable to vote. (2 uses)
**Energy Redirection:** Removes your death immunity for tonight to make your attack bypass death immunity. (Inf uses)
**Night Abilities:**
**Accident:** Attack a player. If you are redirected to your twin or yourself you will not attack. (Inf uses)
**Gang up:** Attack a player. This bypasses healing. If you are redirected to your twin or yourself you will not attack. (3 uses)
**Notes:**
2 twins will always spawn and show up in a night room. Not 3, or 1, but 2, if they are the NK. They take up the last neutral spot if they do spawn.
